sections.title: The Universal Adapter To Integrate Work Tools
sections.body: Use our standardized Work API to easily connect work tools to your use case

sections.title: Connecting work integrations to your use case

columns.title: Without the Work API
points: Lots of different work tools, each requiring their own logic for integration
Gaps / differences in the functionalities offered by the tool providers' APIs
Painstaking process to connect two tools (handle data formats, paradigms, errors, idiosyncracies unique to each platform)
Tool providers change integrations over time, requiring re-builds of your solution
You do not know before building the integrations if it's worth the cost

columns.title: With the Work API
points: One consistent SDK covering all work media forms and integrations
We filled the gaps and aligned the differences in the functionalities offered
All tools are interconnected already, enabling cross-tool functionalities (e.g. save email attachments)
Our API remains persistent, no need for re-builds!
No risk involved: The costs scale 100% with usage. First 50,000 requests free every month!

points.title: We stay out of your users' content
points.description: All content remains hosted by the tool provider - our API acts as a 'pipe'

points.title: You only pay for the number of requests you send to our API
points.description: The costs scale fully with your application

points.title: Everything comes pre-connected to each other
points.description: For example attach a Google Drive file to an Outlook Email in one request
